description.html:
I broke the gazebo-ci-default-xenial-* builds with pr #885, since gcc-8 is not available on xenial.

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/400/

This sets all the gazebo-ci-default ubuntu jobs to use bionic.

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo/578/
Added items:
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-nvidia'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-bionic-i386-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-coverage-bionic-amd64-gpu-nvidia'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTRelease-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTDebug-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTCoverage-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-none'}
...
Unreferenced items:
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-coverage-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-xenial-i386-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTCoverage-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTDebug-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTRelease-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
Disabled items:
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTCoverage-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-xenial-i386-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-coverage-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTRelease-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}
    GeneratedJob{name='gazebo-ci_BTDebug-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none'}

It looks like the gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none job is gone, but there was no gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-none to replace it? never mind, that job existed before and still exists

title.raw: gazebo.dsl: use bionic for all gazebo-ci-default ubuntu jobs, since it now requires gcc8
